comment._content: Joseph R. Darling was a special agent of the Department of Justice, author of "Darling on Trusts" (1915), a legal treatise: openlibrary.org/b/OL19744141M/Darling-on-trusts

comment.author: 35277872@N05
comment._content: pennylrichardsca: Thanks for the information. We'll adjust the description with the more complete name when we update the record.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I added him to Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_R._Darling JOSEPH DARLING, ADVENTURER, 85; Author, Promoter, Explorer, Soldier of Fortune Dies --Did Antitrust Work Special to The New York Times. September 7, 1957, Saturday MIAMI, Fla., Sept. 6--Joseph Robinson Darling, author, promoter, explorer and soldier of fortune, died at his home here today after a short illness. His age was 85. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/richard_arthur_norton/3763798358/]
